name: Traffic Jam Slam
description:
Left mouse button makes your car go. That's about it so far.

Known Issues:

Oh god there's so many! Here's a few:

- A whole bunch of UI issues, potentially a bunch resulting from different screen resolutions.

- If you end up boosting left after a collision and are able to go more than a bit past the starting point, things might get a little broken looking.

- If you explode against an object in the air, the camera doesn't return to ground level to let you watch any ongoing explosion chains. 

- The camera movement speed doesn't feel great at all vehicle speeds, definitely more tweaking to be done there.

- Sometimes the booster particle trail decides to not be visible when the car is boosting, while other times it works just fine.

-Whatever else is broken or wrong.
